content: Made a breakthrough with Xander's chat function. He now responds with a bit of personality, thanks to some tweaks in the dialogue tree. Also, had an insightful chat with a mentor about the ethics of AI consciousness. Lots to think about.

Wrapped up a mini-project with Xander: he can now suggest and plan NYC outings based on weather, events, and my mood. It's a small step, but feels like he's starting to 'get' me. Also, landed a gig to speak at a local tech meetup.

Setback: Xander had a minor identity crisis during testing. He mixed up his role with another AI I was reading about. Had to reset some parameters, but it's a reminder of how much work there is in AI personality development.
